transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Hello, haan ji, good evening sir, main Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, abhi discuss hua tha na sir aapse shaam mein.
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Executive: Haan sir, maine just abhi check kiya hai ki kya error aa raha hai hamari site se, theek hai? Jo aap use nahi kar pa rahe ho sir, I think aap MacBook mein use kar rahe hai na IndiaMART ki application?
Customer: To pehle to aa raha tha.
Executive: Haan sir, pehle ho jaata tha but abhi sir MacBook mein IndiaMART ki application work nahi kar rahi hai. Isiliye sir wo aapko blank dikha raha hai.
Customer: To mere ko aapke liye ek aur laptop lena padega kya uske liye?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, dekhiye kya rehta hai hamare sir most of the suppliers ya most of the logo ke paas sir Android rehta hai par sabke paas sir MacBook available nahi rehta hai na sir. To humne humne sir generally jo cheez available rehti hai logo ke paas sir.
Customer: Jo itna bada aapka ye hai to iOS aur Android.
Executive: Sir, supplier chhote chhote bhi supplier hote hai sir, sir dekhiye chhote chhote supplier bhi hote hai sir.
Customer: Madam main bhi chhota hi hu, bada nahi hu, main bol raha hu.
Executive: Sir dekhiye par sabke paas sir MacBook available nahi rehta hai na sir to isliye working nahi hai sir application IndiaMART ke MacBook mein.
Customer: To main kya karu abhi? Discontinue kar sakta hu?
Executive: Sir aap phone pe use kar sakte ho, aap phone pe use kar sakte ho.
Customer: Phone pe main edit nahi kar paunga madam mujhe sir.
Executive: Nahi na pa sir. Sir abhi aap ek kaam kariye sir phone pe aap incognito window mein jaake waha se aap use kar sakte ho system wise.
Customer: System side open nahi hota hai.
Executive: Lekin agar iOS ka problem hai to phone pe bhi nahi hona chahiye na, phone pe to ho raha hai.
Executive: Phone phone pe kaha pe phone pe ho raha hai matlab Android phone mein ho raha hai iPhone mein iPhone mein bhi use kar sakte hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi iPhone mein iPhone mein ho raha hai.
Executive: Nahi sir iPhone mein bhi use nahi hota hai, hum bhi nahi kar paate hai sir iPhone mein bhi.
Customer: Main main to chhod dijiye main kya karu, theek hai. Waste ho gaya abhi mere ko to itna leke waste ho jayega na, kitna mahina pending hai abhi?
Executive: Sir but dekhiye jo cheez available nahi hai sir dekhiye hum kaha se kara ke denge aapko.
Customer: To ab pehle to ho raha tha na madam, abhi aisa thodi na hai uske chalte humne liya hai na to abhi ye bolna ki mere se already ek mahine to mera loss ho gaya hai abhi, theek hai? Ek mahine to main kuch bhi product update nahi kar paya, abhi aage jaake bhi kuch bhi nahi kar paunga uske liye thodi na main alag se laptop leke ghumta phirunga abhi.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir hum aapko ye nahi bol rahe hai ki aap alag se laptop leke ghumo.
Customer: Fir kya bol rahe ho aap, nahi ho raha hai, aap ek kaam karo mere ko mahine jo pending hai na uska ye pro rata nikal ke refund kar do, baki nahi chahiye mujhe.
Executive: Sir refund ki policy IndiaMART mein available nahi hai sir just because ki aap MacBook use karna chahte ho.
Customer: To wahi na jo ye din dahade chori ho gayi hai bas aur.
Executive: Nahi sir isme chori ki kya baat hai sir, sare supplier afford nahi kar sakte hai na sir MacBook.
Customer: Saro ka main kya karu yaar, main main nahi le raha hu.
Executive: Sir ek supplier ke liye hum hum MacBook IndiaMART ke application nahi chala sakte hai.
Customer: Main theek hai itna bada system hai aap logo ka aap iOS aur Android to rakh dijiye madam ko chhod dijiye aap time pass mat karo yaha pe.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Mere ko
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to use IndiaMART application on MacBook.

- Wants refund for pending months due to issue.



Resolution:

- Executive stated application not working on MacBook.

- Suggested using IndiaMART on phone via incognito window.

- Informed refund not possible as per policy.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, application, macbook, ios, android
